OPTION_LANGUAGE_DESC: A language to display translated data

OPTION_YEAR_DESC: Only include results that have a release date that is equal to the specified value

OPTION_MAX_YEAR_DESC: Only include results that have a release date that is less than or equal to the specified value
OPTION_MIN_VOTES_DESC: Only include results that have a vote count that is greater or equal to the specified value
OPTION_MAX_VOTES_DESC: Only include results that have a vote count that is less than or equal to the specified value
OPTION_MIN_RATING_DESC: Only include results that have a rating that is greater or equal to the specified value
OPTION_MAX_RATING_DESC: Only include results that have a rating that is less than or equal to the specified value
OPTION_MIN_RUNTIME_DESC: Only include results that have a runtime that is greater or equal to a value
OPTION_MAX_RUNTIME_DESC: Only include results that have a runtime that is less than or equal to a value
OPTION_INTERVAL_DESC: Choose between the trends of the day or the week
